title: Intro AE Vehicle Perform
description: Orbital mechanics, orbit determination, and spacecraft maneuvers. Basics of airplane flight including climb, cruise, takeoff, and landing. Actuator disk theory and elements of rotorcraft performance.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (MATH 2403 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2413 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 24X3 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2562 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2X52 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T) and AE 3030 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
